cmd_docs.aaa:
AAA - a subsystem that manages and stores information about users, access rights of objects, events and the calculation of resource checksums on the cluster

  aaa
   namespace
    del - Delete namespace (Virtual DC) from Cluster 

  aaa
   namespace
    add - Add new namespace to Cluster 

  aaa
   namespace
    list - List namespaces (Virtual DC) from Cluster 

  aaa
   namespace
    show - Show namespace (Virtual DC) from Cluster 

  aaa
   user
    del - Delete user

  aaa
   user
    add - Add new user

  aaa
   user
    update - Update user

  aaa
   user
    list - List users

  aaa
   user
    show - Show user

  aaa
   param
    del - Delete AAA params

  aaa
   param
    add - Add AAA params

  aaa
   param
    show - Show AAA params

  aaa
   param
    update - Update AAA params

  aaa
   role
    del - Delete role

  aaa
   role
    add - Add new role

  aaa
   role
    update - Update role

  aaa
   role
    list - List roles

  aaa
   role
    show - Show role
cmd_docs.cluster:
API for Core cluster 2.0.0
  cluster
   list - Get clusters list

  cluster
   freenodes
    list - Get free nodes list

  cluster
   metrics
    list - Get metrics

  cluster
   repo
    list - Get plugin list

  cluster
   add - Create new Cluster

  cluster
   nodes
    update - Modify Cluster node

  cluster
   plugins
    list - Get clusters plugin list

  cluster
   plugins
    add - Start plugin

  cluster
   repo
    plugins
     list - Get clusters plugin list

  cluster
   repo
    plugins
     add - Plugin install

  cluster
   service
    update - Update service conf

  cluster
   version
    list - Get cluster version

  cluster
   vip
    add - Change Cluster Service

acc_block_unused_days.desc: Days after block unused account (default - 45 days)

acc_delete_days.desc: Days after completly delete account (default - 45 days)

ldap_sync.desc: Sync data from LDAP server (default - no)

password_pattern.desc: Password regexp pattern (default - min 8 + UpperCase + LowerCase + Number + Spec char )
